trans-unit.target: TEXT_CLSGLA011_00285_SEQ_00<tab>Lulutsu wishes you to reaffirm your desire to join the Gladiators' Guild.
TEXT_CLSGLA011_00285_SEQ_01<tab>Lulutsu has bid you speak with First Sword Mylla, whose approval you must obtain if you wish to join the guild.

TEXT_CLSGLA011_00285_SEQ_02<tab>Satisfied that you have the strength to live by the sword, the guildmaster furnishes you with a weathered weapon. Equip the blade and speak to her once more to begin your training.
TEXT_CLSGLA011_00285_TODO_00<tab>Speak with First Sword Mylla.
TEXT_CLSGLA011_00285_LULUTSU_000_1<tab>What will it be? Will you rise above the masses and inscribe your name in legend, or will you resign yourself to mediocrity and die in obscurity?
TEXT_CLSGLA011_00285_LULUTSU_000_2<tab>Oh, so it's to be death in obscurity...
TEXT_CLSGLA011_00285_LULUTSU_000_3<tab>Well, should you come to your senses, you may speak with me at any time to proceed with the enrollment process.
TEXT_CLSGLA011_00285_LULUTSU_000_4<tab>A decision you shan't regret. One moment─make way for <var 29 EB02 /var>! Fresh meat coming through!
TEXT_CLSGLA011_00285_LULUTSU_000_5<tab>Now then, before your enrollment can be considered complete, you must present yourself to First Sword Mylla. Seek her out and obtain her approval.
TEXT_CLSGLA011_00285_MYLLA_000_10<tab>Aye, I heard Lulutsu. So you're <var 29 EB02 /var>. 'Tis a good, strong name.
TEXT_CLSGLA011_00285_MYLLA_000_11<tab>On behalf of the Gladiators' Guild, allow me to welcome you. I am Mylla, guildmaster here.
TEXT_CLSGLA011_00285_MYLLA_000_12<tab>So you wish to study our arts. I presume you have your reasons for choosing the sword over all other weapons. Perhaps you think it easiest to learn.
TEXT_CLSGLA011_00285_MYLLA_000_15<tab>A sword is a simple weapon. But to wield a blade well is anything but simple.
TEXT_CLSGLA011_00285_MYLLA_000_16<tab>For every Coliseum champion to emerge from our ranks, there have been countless disappointments who failed to achieve greatness.

TEXT_CLSGLA011_00285_MYLLA_000_17<tab>Bear that in mind before you answer me, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, for I do not ask this question lightly: have you the strength to live by the sword and─if it be your fate─die by it?
TEXT_CLSGLA011_00285_Q2_000_1<tab>Have you the strength to live by the sword?
TEXT_CLSGLA011_00285_A2_000_1<tab>Yes
TEXT_CLSGLA011_00285_A2_000_2<tab>No
TEXT_CLSGLA011_00285_MYLLA_000_20<tab>Then perhaps your path lies elsewhere. Should it lead you back to us someday, we can discuss your future once more.
TEXT_CLSGLA011_00285_MYLLA_000_22<tab>Then welcome, gladiator, to your new home!
TEXT_CLSGLA011_00285_MYLLA_000_23<tab>Take this sword. There are many like it, but this one is yours now.
TEXT_CLSGLA011_00285_MYLLA_000_24<tab>Consider it a gift if you like. Now wear it on your hip as I do, and show me you are ready to begin your training!
TEXT_CLSGLA011_00285_SYSTEM_000_30<tab>You have unlocked a new class! You can change to this class at any time by equipping the weapon received from this quest.

TEXT_CLSGLA011_00285_SYSTEM_000_31<tab>When changing classes, <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>gear sets<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> will allow you to register and save your equipment. You may then use them to switch between classes instantly without the need to manually equip weapons or equipment.

TEXT_CLSGLA011_00285_SYSTEM_000_32<tab>A button for the Gear Set interface is located in the upper portion of the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Character<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> window.
